summary: Consume the Raindrop API to perform operations such as creating, updating, deleting bookmarks, and more.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., Bookmark, Collection, Tag, User).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Create, Delete, Get).

parameters.name: collection name or id
parameters.description: Choose a collection name or ID for the operation. Can be specified using an expression.

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: Link of the bookmark to be created.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating a bookmark (e.g., Important, Order, Tags).

parameters.name: bookmark id
parameters.description: The ID of the bookmark to delete or retrieve.
